name: Pit Rats
description:
Made for the lost relic games jam, the theme of connection reminded me of co-op multiplayer games. I wanted to explore that concept further by seeing if it was possible to create a similar bonding experience with AI bots. 

In the game, you play as captured siblings forced into an arena. You will need to work together to survive. 

Choose your character and collect experience to level up. W/A/S/D or arrow keys to move, Q E R for abilities. 

Splash Art by Jesse Wang
